entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: E 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:14 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:14 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:14 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
